name: audiopie
description: AudioPie - build m4b audiobooks from mp3 tracks with chapter editing

scripts.version:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:premajor: npm version premajor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:preminor: npm version preminor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:prepatch: npm version prepatch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:prerelease: npm version prerelease && git push && git push --tags
